title: I feel like my ping should be lower
body:
I am 600 miles from Chicago, my ping sits around ~51. I have tried to check out your ping page, and I don't really see anything that I feel applicable to improving my ping.

Maybe I'm just missing it

replies.body: Which one is the ping page?  Have you tried the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)?  Even if you're close, you could be having some local obstructions weakening your network a bit.  It could even be how your ISP is getting to the game server.  Go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and make sure things are running smooth on your side.  Hope it helps!
